timeline.bodyText:
nit , which, when enabled, reads a bit clunky .
Can we simplify the entire sentence.
timeline.author: ajaygeorge
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+=============
+Release 0.243
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Add function ``truncate(x, n)``.
+* Add aggregation function ``approxMostFrequent``.
+* Add session property ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only``, which, when enabled, only performs access control checks on columns that would actually be required to produce the query output, ignoring columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results.

replies.bodyText: Add session property check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only, which toggles performing access control checks on columns that are used to produce the query output thereby ignoring columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results.
replies.author: sachdevs

timeline.bodyText: Is mentioning No replacement is needed. important?
timeline.author: ajaygeorge
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+=============
+Release 0.243
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Add function ``truncate(x, n)``.
+* Add aggregation function ``approxMostFrequent``.
+* Add session property ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only``, which, when enabled, only performs access control checks on columns that would actually be required to produce the query output, ignoring columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results.
+* Add session property ``remote_functions_enabled`` to configure whether remote functions are allowed.
+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Add function ``truncate(x, n)``.
+* Add aggregation function ``approxMostFrequent``.
+* Fix query failure when explaining ``Use`` statement.
+* Add session property ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only``, which, when enabled, only performs access control checks on columns that would actually be required to produce the query output, ignoring columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results.
+* Add session property ``remote_functions_enabled`` to configure whether remote functions are allowed.
+* Remove config property ``optimizer.optimize-full-outer-join-with-coalesce`` and the corresponding session property ``optimize_full_outer_join_with_coalesce``. The feature will always be enabled.
+* Remove deprecated configuration properties ``grouped-execution-for-aggregation-enabled`` and ``grouped-execution-for-join-enabled`` and their corresponding session properties ``grouped_execution_for_aggregation`` and ``grouped_execution_for_join``.  These have been replaced by a single configuration property ``grouped-execution-enabled`` and session property ``grouped-execution``.
+* Remove deprecated configuration property ``dynamic-schedule-for-grouped-execution`` and session property ``dynamic_schedule_for_grouped_execution``.  No replacement is needed.

replies.bodyText: nah we can leave it out.

timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+=============
+Release 0.243
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Add function ``truncate(x, n)``.
+* Add aggregation function ``approxMostFrequent``.
+* Add session property ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only``, which, when enabled, only performs access control checks on columns that would actually be required to produce the query output, ignoring columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results.
+* Add session property ``remote_functions_enabled`` to configure whether remote functions are allowed.
+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Add function ``truncate(x, n)``.
+* Add aggregation function ``approxMostFrequent``.
+* Fix query failure when explaining ``Use`` statement.
+* Add session property ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only``, which, when enabled, only performs access control checks on columns that would actually be required to produce the query output, ignoring columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results.
+* Add session property ``remote_functions_enabled`` to configure whether remote functions are allowed.
+* Remove config property ``optimizer.optimize-full-outer-join-with-coalesce`` and the corresponding session property ``optimize_full_outer_join_with_coalesce``. The feature will always be enabled.
+* Remove deprecated configuration properties ``grouped-execution-for-aggregation-enabled`` and ``grouped-execution-for-join-enabled`` and their corresponding session properties ``grouped_execution_for_aggregation`` and ``grouped_execution_for_join``.  These have been replaced by a single configuration property ``grouped-execution-enabled`` and session property ``grouped-execution``.
+* Remove deprecated configuration property ``dynamic-schedule-for-grouped-execution`` and session property ``dynamic_schedule_for_grouped_execution``.  No replacement is needed.
+
+Verifier Changes
+________________
+* Improve verifier handling of broadcast memory limit by removing it, if it is set via session property to avoid CBO broadcast induced failures on smaller verifier clusters.

timeline.author: ajaygeorge
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+=============
+Release 0.243
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Add function ``truncate(x, n)``.
+* Add aggregation function ``approxMostFrequent``.
+* Add session property ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only``, which, when enabled, only performs access control checks on columns that would actually be required to produce the query output, ignoring columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results.
+* Add session property ``remote_functions_enabled`` to configure whether remote functions are allowed.
+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Add function ``truncate(x, n)``.
+* Add aggregation function ``approxMostFrequent``.
+* Fix query failure when explaining ``Use`` statement.
+* Add session property ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only``, which, when enabled, only performs access control checks on columns that would actually be required to produce the query output, ignoring columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results.
+* Add session property ``remote_functions_enabled`` to configure whether remote functions are allowed.
+* Remove config property ``optimizer.optimize-full-outer-join-with-coalesce`` and the corresponding session property ``optimize_full_outer_join_with_coalesce``. The feature will always be enabled.
+* Remove deprecated configuration properties ``grouped-execution-for-aggregation-enabled`` and ``grouped-execution-for-join-enabled`` and their corresponding session properties ``grouped_execution_for_aggregation`` and ``grouped_execution_for_join``.  These have been replaced by a single configuration property ``grouped-execution-enabled`` and session property ``grouped-execution``.
+* Remove deprecated configuration property ``dynamic-schedule-for-grouped-execution`` and session property ``dynamic_schedule_for_grouped_execution``.  No replacement is needed.
+
+Verifier Changes
+________________
+* Improve verifier handling of broadcast memory limit by removing it, if it is set via session property to avoid CBO broadcast induced failures on smaller verifier clusters.
+* Add support to verify ``CREATE VIEW`` and ``CREATE TABLE`` queries.
+
+Geospatial Changes
+__________________
+* Add support to allow geometries outside of the spatial partitioning to match in a partitioned spatial join.
+
+Hive Changes
+____________
+* Add caching module for Parquet metadata.
+* Improve metadata query optimizer so that it does not fetch all partitions from metastore when hive filter pushdown is enabled.
+
+Pinot Changes
+_____________
+* Add support for pushing down aggregation function ``approx_distinct(x, e)`` to Pinot connector.
+* Add support for pushing down array functions ``array_sum``, ``array_min``, ``array_max``, ``array_average``, and ``contains`` to Pinot connector.

replies.bodyText:
How about rephrasing this to:
Add support for Parquet file metadata caching
The related config is parquet.metadata-cache-enabled, parquet.metadata-cache-size and parquet.metadata-cache-ttl-since-last-access, but I'm not sure if we want to go to this level of detail after reading other bullets.
replies.author: shixuan-fan

Following the guideline in https://github.com/prestodb/presto/wiki/Release-Notes-Guidelines#phrasing - this should be phrased as (also, we can shorten it)
Add support for ignoring access checks on columns that are referenced in the query,
but are not required to compute the query results. This can be enabled by the session .....

@prithvip for his thoughts on this framing.

+
+Pinot Changes
+_____________
+* Add support for pushing down aggregation function ``approx_distinct(x, e)`` to Pinot connector.

timeline.bodyText: nit: config -> configuration. Every sentence after uses configuration 😃
timeline.author: sachdevs
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+=============
+Release 0.243
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Add function ``truncate(x, n)``.
+* Add aggregation function ``approxMostFrequent``.
+* Add session property ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only``, which, when enabled, only performs access control checks on columns that would actually be required to produce the query output, ignoring columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results.
+* Add session property ``remote_functions_enabled`` to configure whether remote functions are allowed.
+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Add function ``truncate(x, n)``.
+* Add aggregation function ``approxMostFrequent``.
+* Fix query failure when explaining ``Use`` statement.
+* Add session property ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only``, which, when enabled, only performs access control checks on columns that would actually be required to produce the query output, ignoring columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results.
+* Add session property ``remote_functions_enabled`` to configure whether remote functions are allowed.
+* Remove config property ``optimizer.optimize-full-outer-join-with-coalesce`` and the corresponding session property ``optimize_full_outer_join_with_coalesce``. The feature will always be enabled.

+=============
+Release 0.243
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Add :func:`approx_most_frequent` aggregation function.
+* Add support to :func:`truncate` function to allow the users specify the number of digits to the right of the decimal point in the truncated result.
+* Add support for ignoring access checks on columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results. This can be enabled with the ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only`` session property.
+* Add support to verify ``CREATE VIEW`` and ``CREATE TABLE`` queries.

@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@
+=============
+Release 0.243
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Add :func:`approx_most_frequent` aggregation function.
+* Add support to :func:`truncate` function to allow the users specify the number of digits to the right of the decimal point in the truncated result.
+* Add support for ignoring access checks on columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results. This can be enabled with the ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only`` session property.
+* Add support in verifier to verify ``CREATE VIEW`` and ``CREATE TABLE`` queries.
+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix query failure when using ``EXPLAIN`` with a ``USE`` statement.
+* Add :func:`approx_most_frequent` aggregation function.
+* Add support to :func:`truncate` function to allow the users specify the number of digits to the right of the decimal point in the truncated result.

timeline.author: rschlussel
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,50 @@
+=============
+Release 0.243
+=============
+
+**Highlights**
+==============
+* Add :func:`approx_most_frequent` aggregation function.
+* Add support to :func:`truncate` function to allow the users specify the number of digits to the right of the decimal point in the truncated result.
+* Add support for ignoring access checks on columns that are referenced in the query, but are not required to compute the query results. This can be enabled with the ``check_access_control_on_utilized_columns_only`` session property.
+* Add support in verifier to verify ``CREATE VIEW`` and ``CREATE TABLE`` queries.
+
+**Details**
+===========
+
+General Changes
+_______________
+* Fix query failure when using ``EXPLAIN`` with a ``USE`` statement.
+* Add :func:`approx_most_frequent` aggregation function.
+* Add support to :func:`truncate` function to allow the users specify the number of digits to the right of the decimal point in the truncated result.
+* Remove configuration property ``optimizer.optimize-full-outer-join-with-coalesce`` and the corresponding session property ``optimize_full_outer_join_with_coalesce``. The feature will always be enabled.
+* Remove deprecated configuration properties ``grouped-execution-for-aggregation-enabled`` and ``grouped-execution-for-join-enabled`` and their corresponding session properties ``grouped_execution_for_aggregation`` and ``grouped_execution_for_join``.  These have been replaced by a single configuration property ``grouped-execution-enabled`` and session property ``grouped-execution``.
